'''''Waveriding Treasure Hunter (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 120 [[Chest]]s in the [[Liffey Region]] and the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
